General.Name: Miwon Specialty Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Miwon Specialty Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the production and supply of basic raw materials for UV/EB curing systems in Korea and internationally. The company's product line includes acrylate and methacrylate monomers, oligomers, photoinitiators, and other related fine chemicals. Its products are used in wood, metal, plastic, nail art, printing ink, adhesive, electronic, optical film, and CD/DVD/Bluray applications. The company was founded in 1959 is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
